p.s: The text Hope of escape lost in translation, written by Zia Haider Rahman and published in The Sunday Times on 17th December 2016, is about learning languages to integrate in another country and the author's opinion what today's society is telling immigrants with all these translations.
At first the author says that all the translations for immigrants who don't speak the language are sending them the wrong message that they do not have to learn it and even not to integrate.
She has the opinion that translation and interpreting services have to be ended so that everybody has to speak English.
She also has the opinion that celebrating differences do not really helps by getting integrated.
The author writes about her own experiences when she immigrated and thanks her parents for determination they had to learn English and to start ana better life in Britain.
